name: Trenton Sullivan
coverLetter: Looking for the opportunity to earn money and learn the whole process of growing on a bigger scale. Interested in agriculture, music , travel , solar.  I'd be very grateful for any opportunity and would appreciate someone who wants to share more knowledge then needed to get the job done. I'm from Houston and have been staying with friends in Santa Monica for about 3 weeks. I'm very honest and trustworthy. I give people respect and am naturally inquisitive. God bless
